name: deg1xrf
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3

stmt.origin: mdegxrf(c0, c1, c1o, c2, co(c1o, cmpl, c2))

body.origin:
|- wf(c0, c1, cxr)
-| wceq(c0, co(c1o, cmdg, c2))
-| wceq(co(c1o, cmpl, c2), co(c1o, cmpl, c2))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, co(c1o, cmpl, c2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wf(c0, c1, cxr)
-| wceq(c0, co(c1o, cmdg, c2))
-| wceq(co(c1o, cmpl, c2), co(c1o, cmpl, c2))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, co(c1o, cmpl, c2)))

body.origin:
|- wceq(c0, co(c1o, cmdg, c2))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(cdg1, c2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wf(c0, c1, cxr)
-| wceq(co(c1o, cmpl, c2), co(c1o, cmpl, c2))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, co(c1o, cmpl, c2)))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(cdg1, c2))

body.origin: |- wceq(co(c1o, cmpl, c2), co(c1o, cmpl, c2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wf(c0, c1, cxr)
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, co(c1o, cmpl, c2)))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(cdg1, c2))

body.origin:
|- wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, co(c1o, cmpl, c2)))
-| wceq(c3, cfv(cpl1, c2))
-| wceq(cfv(cps1, c2), cfv(cps1, c2))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c3))
body.pretty:
⊢ c1 =(Base `(1o[mPoly]c2))
⊣ c3 =(Poly1 ` c2)
⊣ (PwSer1 ` c2)=(PwSer1 ` c2)
⊣ c1 =(Base ` c3)

cumulated.origin:
|- wf(c0, c1, cxr)
-| wceq(c0, cfv(cdg1, c2))
-| wceq(c3, cfv(cpl1, c2))
-| wceq(cfv(cps1, c2), cfv(cps1, c2))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c3))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 : c1 → ℝ*)
⊣ c0 =(deg1 ` c2)
⊣ c3 =(Poly1 ` c2)
⊣ (PwSer1 ` c2)=(PwSer1 ` c2)
⊣ c1 =(Base ` c3)

cumulated.origin:
|- wf(c0, c1, cxr)
-| wceq(c0, cfv(cdg1, c2))
-| wceq(c3, cfv(cpl1, c2))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c3))

comment: Functionality of univariate polynomial degree, weak range. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 23-Mar-2015.)
